LanguageData.ARA_Huge_Weapon_Category.label: Huge Armed Organ
LanguageData.ARA_Huge_Weapon_Category.description: This armed organ is extremely massive, and only large Arachne (body size 2.0 or greater) can use this weapon.
LanguageData.ARA_Weapon_Damage_Category.label: Special Armed Organ
LanguageData.ARA_Weapon_Damage_Category.description: This armed organ can not only deal regular damage, but also cause other effects.
